name: Flowery Clearing
Description: You remember seeing an unbeaten path that leads to a hidden clearing...

theScene: As you travel through the forest, you decide to trek through a more unbeaten path into the woods in a moment of wanderlust.
Eventually, your efforts are rewarded as you come across a beautiful clearing among the trees, surrounded by various flora.
You stretch and take in the view, noting the lush green grass, colorful flowers, and the butterfly girl hovering about...
You do a double-take to make sure you weren't imagining the flying monster girl and prepare for a fight, closely observing her.
But she actually doesn't notice you at all. Instead, she glides above the flowers, lightly stepping on each one with an ecstatic expression.
Mmmm~! Yummy nectar~♪, tasty nectar~♪, and not an Alraune in sight! Oh~! That one looks delicious too! Hmm~♪ hmm~♪.
The butterfly girl hums as she floats over the field, occasionally tilting herself downwards to lap up the nectar off of a flower.
Observing her delicately touching the flowers with her feet, it's as if she could 'taste' the flowers and check them for nectar. Her performance halts as she touches a particularly large tulip.
Oh~? This one has quite a lot! I mustn't let any of it go to waste!
The butterfly girl excitedly holds the tulip between her soles and, with graceful dexterity, bends down to lick the insides of the flower.
Suddenly, the butterfly girl jerks back and curiously looks around the field, quickly gulping down the last of her drink.
Suddenly, the butterfly girl jerks back and curiously looks around the field, her lips still dripping with nectar.
One of her antennae rigidly flickers toward your direction. Caught unawares, you attempt to blend among the tall grass, but quickly find it to be futile as she hovers over with a wide grin.
Oh~? Oh~? An adventurer? Here? How do you do~♪? How'd you get here? What's your name? Mine's Ma~ri♪.
What forest path did you take? Who did you see along the way? Did you find the forest dungeon yet? What's that rune you're wearing? Can I see~?

She gleefully circles around you as she barrages you with her curious questions. As you give her your name and the details of your little detour, you can't help but notice that she draws ever closer with each answer.
By the end of it, her face is right before yours, staring in wonder.
It's not until you give a confused blink that she notices and quickly flies back, retreating from your personal space.
M-my bad, I don't usually see adventurers that often, especially {i}male{/i} adventurers...
She gives you a quick lust-filled glance before recomposing herself.
Ah! You came here by yourself, right? There aren't any {i}Alraunes{/i} that know about this?
As she speaks, she does a little twirl and an encompassing gesture with her arms, an alert, protective gleam in her deep blue eyes. Slightly confused, you nevertheless reply obligingly.
Nope, didn't come across any on the way.
She leans all the way down and breathes a sigh of relief.
Good! Then this place is a secret between us, {ThePlayerName}!~♪ Pinky promise?

You raise your pinky, preparing for hers. However, Mari raises her foot to your hand instead, and curls her pinky toe around your little finger. You fluster at the unfamiliar action, but manage to give a proper shake.
However, Mari doesn't quite let go of your finger, and instead grips more of it with her dainty toes. She audibly licks her lips as she holds on to your hand.
You know, adventurer~... Your hand tastes pretty good... I bet your 'nectar' would taste even better~♥... Won't you let me 'taste' you more?♥
You'll have to work for it! (Fight)
Let her do as she wishes...

EventText.NameOfScene: Why aren't Alraunes allowed to know?
theScene: With childlike petulance, she stamps her foot as she hotly asserts.
She shows a pouty expression as she continues on.
